product_name: KAVU Manzanita Shoulder Bag - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: You'll love how simple the KAVU Manzanita Shoulder Bag looks, and you'll totally appreciate all its pockets for your phone, wallet and other necessities. Polyester bag features a contoured, ergonomic design that nestles nicely against your side. KAVU Manzanita Shoulder Bag has an adjustable shoulder strap. Main compartment zips closed; 1 internal zip pocket. 3 external zip pockets plus 1 external rip-and-stick stash pocket. Closeout.
short_description: You'll love how simple the KAVU Manzanita Shoulder Bag looks, and you'll totally appreciate all its pockets for your phone, wallet and other necessities.
